snippet: India made the second-highest number of demands for information on accounts, after the United States.
abstract: India made the second-highest number of demands for information on accounts, after the United States.
lead_paragraph: “In the first six months of this year, governments around the world made 20,938 requests to Google to provide information on 34,614 accounts, the company said,” Natasha Singer reports on the Bits blog. “In the same period in 2011, governments made 15,744 requests on 25,342 accounts, according to company data.”

headline.main: Governments Worldwide Asking Google to Hand Over More Data
